channel.title: Ftpkz 100% new eco-server! (need hoster)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j470/kenazi1/background-1.jpg[/img] This gonna be our banner and i will remove the "i will give you link later".
I hope we get the server online and get alot of players and enjoy its life time. We are just making an simple eco-server. I want a old 2007-server but i don't find any. If someone have a 2007 server and if he want to give it to me i will publish that instead of the eco-server.
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j470/kenazi1/homere-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j470/kenazi1/homere1-2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j470/kenazi1/homeresum1-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1087.photobucket.com/albums/j470/kenazi1/homeresum-1-1.jpg[/img]
Positions:
Hoster 0/1 Server coders 0/2 Client coders 0/2 Mods 0/2 Admin 0/2
Hoster:
1.Name in-game: 2.Gb ram: 3.Kilobyte per sec: 4.How long can you host per week: 5.Msn or skype:
Server/client coder:
1.Name in-game: 2.Experience: 3.Msn or skype:
Mod/admin:
1.Name in-game: 2.Been promoted before: 3.Been demoted before: 4.Will you follow all the rules: 5.Msn or skype:
I hope you guys will join and i got the server ready so i will look forward to have the server up in a week or two :)

item.title: Ftpkz 100% new eco-server! (need hoster)
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“F A I L S, post:16, topic:414466”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=516429.msg3748555#msg3748555 date=1315864914]

[quote author=F A I L S link=topic=516429.msg3748544#msg3748544 date=1315864616]

[quote author=liamp link=topic=516429.msg3748498#msg3748498 date=1315862672]

Looks like a ripoff from torvapkz

looks like another pi and change that banner it so horrible but gl anyway
[/quote]Face-Palm I can see a future in this source. As for you Liam, I don’t know whether you are talking about the banner, or the server all together. Just remember (Developer) this is his opinion, don’t take offence to it. Now, in my opinion, I can actually see this being really good in the future. Good luck on this, and good luck on any future releases, I’m afraid to give you my support because this might just be like any other development, Never get’s finished. Every development I support, I have faith in, I’m going to take a gamble and give you my support. Please don’t make me regret it. Good luck.
[/quote]Well to be honest, “Support” only gives the developers a sense of grattitude. I coulden’t care less if someone supported me or not. It would be nice though to know that someone is looking forward to your development. So how would you “regret it?” No offense to be a troll or anything, just a simple question.

OT: I do agree this has a future. Also I agree as stated above by F A I L S that I hope this isn’t just another development where nothing gets finished. Good luck none the less, as I have said before.
[/quote]I don’t have to be told that support means nothing. I am aware of this, I give it to let the developers know that i’m looking forward to their release, and that I will be checking up on their updates, etc. Also I would regret it because that would mean I gave my support to an “Unfinished” project, I don’t know about you, but I don’t like to do that.[/quote]Well if I gave my support to an unfinished development, oh well. Dosen’t really mean anything…

Read full topic

item.title: Ftpkz 100% new eco-server! (need hoster)
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:14, topic:414466”][quote author=F A I L S link=topic=516429.msg3748544#msg3748544 date=1315864616]

[quote author=liamp link=topic=516429.msg3748498#msg3748498 date=1315862672]

Looks like a ripoff from torvapkz

looks like another pi and change that banner it so horrible but gl anyway
[/quote]Face-Palm I can see a future in this source. As for you Liam, I don’t know whether you are talking about the banner, or the server all together. Just remember (Developer) this is his opinion, don’t take offence to it. Now, in my opinion, I can actually see this being really good in the future. Good luck on this, and good luck on any future releases, I’m afraid to give you my support because this might just be like any other development, Never get’s finished. Every development I support, I have faith in, I’m going to take a gamble and give you my support. Please don’t make me regret it. Good luck.
[/quote]Well to be honest, “Support” only gives the developers a sense of grattitude. I coulden’t care less if someone supported me or not. It would be nice though to know that someone is looking forward to your development. So how would you “regret it?” No offense to be a troll or anything, just a simple question.

OT: I do agree this has a future. Also I agree as stated above by F A I L S that I hope this isn’t just another development where nothing gets finished. Good luck none the less, as I have said before.[/quote]I don’t have to be told that support means nothing. I am aware of this, I give it to let the developers know that i’m looking forward to their release, and that I will be checking up on their updates, etc. Also I would regret it because that would mean I gave my support to an “Unfinished” project, I don’t know about you, but I don’t like to do that.

Read full topic

@zxx75 wrote:


This gonna be our banner and i will remove the “i will give you link later”.

I hope we get the server online and get alot of players and enjoy its life time.
We are just making an simple eco-server. I want a old 2007-server but i don’t find any.
If someone have a 2007 server and if he want to give it to me i will publish that instead of the eco-server.
